text: BRASILIA, May 12 Brazilian cosmetics maker Natura & Co, owner of brands Avon and The Body Shop, reported that its first quarter loss narrowed to 155.2 million reais from 820.8 million a year ago, as online sales jumped.The companys earnings before interest, taxes, depreciation and amortization (EBITDA) rose 470.7%, to 829.1 million reais. (Reporting by Carolina Mandl Editing by Chris Reese)
